net.cloud.server.nio.bufferable

Class BufferableString

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.cloud.server.nio.bufferable.BufferableString
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bufferable

    public class BufferableString
extends Object
implements Bufferable
    A String wrapper that implements Bufferable, useful for when a Bufferable object is expected but the calling code has a String to provide. You could also store this in place of a String, or whatever. Either way, it's just going to rely on the methods in StringUtil. Null is allowed, and do be wary that while String is immutable, this wrapper is not.
